string.text: Camping sleeping bag. Perhaps the most convenient way to stay in the Zone. No protection from radiation, but will protect from rain.

Weapons repair kit for ORC-27m, (modernized), is intended for the maintenance of the short-barreled weapon, (pistols, submachine guns, etc). Includes a high quality weapons lubrications as well as spare parts, tools and equipment for the care and minor repairs due to field conditions. Designed for a multiple applications.

Weapons repair kit for JWC-42 is intended for the maintenance of automatic machine guns and rifles. Includes a high-quality weapons oils and lubrications as well as spare parts, tools and equipment for the care and minor repairs due to field conditions. Designed for a multiple applications.

Repair kit for the bulletproof vest RCH-86u, (universal), is intended for repairing all types of armored clothing, including: bulletproof vests and exoskeletons. It has appeared int the Zone relatively recently. Newest development, designed at the point of the application by the mobile combat groups, which operate separately from main forces. Universal framing of materials and spare parts (armored and the basic assemblies of exoskeletons). Domestic development, which does not have analogs in the world. Before a series it did not go because of the impossibility of its full-valued utilization before the field conditions; therefore it is sufficiently rare and roads. Designed for a multiple applications.
An expeditionary rucksack. It has rubber in its material, so it's waterproof. You can put something valuable inside this rucksack and place it in a hidding place - it would make an excellent stash.
